# hex-to-geometry
Convert HEX geometric data to Shapely geometries


# HEX to Shapely Geometry Converter

This project provides a Python script to convert HEX geometric data to Shapely geometries. It can handle both `Polygon` and `MultiPolygon` geometries.

## Usage

To use the script, simply run the `convert_hex_to_geometry.py` file. The script will print the coordinates of the geometry.

### Example

The following HEX data is used in the script:


### Dependencies

- [Shapely](https://pypi.org/project/Shapely/)

You can install the dependencies using pip:

```sh
pip install shapely
